department: Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED)
short_summary: Develop innovative solutions to improve processes, products, or services.
description: The purpose of this call for proposals is to create a pool of conditionally qualified suppliers that Canada may select from to address government organizations' requirements.
full_summary:
## Call for Proposals TS6 - Innovative Solutions Canada - Testing Stream

### Solicitation Number: EN578-22IS10
### Publication Date: September 22, 2022
### Tender Closing Date: October 21, 2022, at 2:00 PM EDT

#### Overview

Innovative Solutions Canada - Testing Stream (ISC TS) is a research and development program aimed at procuring, testing, and evaluating pre-commercialized goods and services in the late-stage development phase (Technology Readiness Level 7 to 9). Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites innovative solutions to address various problem statements and topics facing federal departments and agencies. This call for proposals seeks solutions to the problem statements and topics outlined on the ISC website under Open Funding Opportunities.

#### Requirement Description

The ISC TS program requires conditionally qualified suppliers to address Government of Canada organizations' requirements. The solicitation period is from September 22, 2022, to November 14, 2022. Only Canadian goods and services are eligible for this requirement.

#### Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Service
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Contract Award Process: Multiple contracts could result from this requirement.
* Estimated Maximum Funding: $3 million (CAD)
* Maximum Contract Value: $550,000 (CAD) for standard problem statements, and $1,150,000 (CAD) for military problem statements (applicable taxes, shipping, and travel and living expenses are extra, as applicable)

#### Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on their relevance to the problem statement and topic, innovation, and ability to address the requirements of the Government of Canada organizations.

#### Contact Information

For any questions or inquiries, please submit written requests to:

TPSGC.PASICVoletessai-APISCTestingStream.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Please allow at least five calendar days for a response.

#### Related Documents

Attachments and additional information can be found at the following links:

* English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/22/cbc2f24fd8cb0a030074330bc2325b21/eng_ts6_cfp_en578-22is10.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/22/cbc2f24fd8cb0a030074330bc
